products.name: DIVANOX
products.shortDescription: A sleek, modular sofa with plush cushions and a minimalist design. Available in soft-touch fabrics and neutral tones for a timeless look.
products.longDescription: The DIVANOX is a sleek, modular sofa designed to bring contemporary elegance to your living space. It features plush cushions for ultimate comfort and a minimalist design that complements any décor. Available in a range of soft-touch fabrics and neutral tones, the DIVANOX offers a timeless look that will remain stylish for years to come. Its modular design allows for flexibility in configuration, making it adaptable to various room sizes and layouts. The DIVANOX is perfect for those seeking both style and comfort in their seating.

products.name: COMFIO
products.shortDescription: The ultimate lounge chair with a deep seat and ergonomic back support. Perfect for curling up with a book or relaxing after a long day.
products.longDescription: The COMFIO lounge chair is designed for ultimate relaxation. Its deep seat and ergonomic back support provide exceptional comfort, making it the perfect spot for curling up with a book or unwinding after a long day. The COMFIO's design prioritizes comfort without sacrificing style, making it a valuable addition to any living room or reading nook.

products.name: RELAXIA
products.shortDescription: A stylish recliner with a smooth, adjustable mechanism. Designed for comfort with high-density foam and soft upholstery.
products.longDescription: The RELAXIA recliner offers both style and comfort. Its smooth, adjustable mechanism allows you to find the perfect position for relaxation. The recliner is designed with high-density foam and soft upholstery, ensuring optimal comfort and support. The RELAXIA is a stylish and functional addition to any living room, providing a dedicated space for relaxation.

The TAVOLONE combines style and practicality, making it a valuable addition to any home.
